description.raw:
Added the necessary instructions to generate the dbg packages for Ubuntu:

* New decription for control file
* Override strip phase in the rules files
* Change the configuration to use Debug version in rules files

It was tested using a home-made script which simulates the jenkins behaviour locally. Both packages, gazebo and gazebo-gdb install just fine. Brian and I tested the full thing using the gdb and obtained a nice trace including function names and line numbers :)

NOTE: we probably want to create **first** the shadow repository (a clone of the production one) in order to test the full thing with jenkins before doing a real release.

It will close issue  #15
